name: 李永山
objective: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、程式語言、資料通訊與網路、WWW、電子商務、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體等。
schedule:
Weeks              Topics
1-2              H/W & Digital System
3                Demo:word/PowerPoint; Skype/MSN/Facebook
4-6              S/W, NetWork, WWW, EC
7                Web2.0/Cloud computing; Free Economics/long tail theory
8                How to process internet store? Blog/Facebook/Youtube/Plurk/Twitter
9                Mid exam
10-11            SharePoint Designer
12               Web site deployment
13-17            DBMS(Access)
18               Final exam
scorePolicy:
HW + presentation 20%
Mid exam          40%
Final exam        60%
materials: 2010新趨勢計算機概論—陳惠貞—碁峰，2010
